definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: The developmental time of each ramet was basically same.
sentences.chinese: 結縷草無性系各分株的發育時間基本相同。

sentences.english: The variation of effective anisotropy was basically the same as that of coercivity.
sentences.chinese: 有效各向異性與矯頑力的變化規律基本相同。

sentences.english: The change of the respiratory rate was almost the same as the changes of ethylene in fruit.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸速率與乙烯釋放量變化基本相同。

sentences.english: It may be used to clinic. In comparison with cow thymosin, the main characteristic was the same.
sentences.chinese: 與小牛胸腺素比較，其主要特性基本相同。

sentences.english: Harry began to reveal himself as more than merely crude.
sentences.chinese: 哈里開始暴露出他的本相不僅僅是粗暴而已。

sentences.english: It is estimated that costumes of Maoniu and Bailang are alike.
sentences.chinese: 估計“牛”羌服飾與“白狼”服飾基本相同。

sentences.english: But I'm afraid to tell the truth.
sentences.chinese: 但我怕說出本相郭德綱于謙。

sentences.english: After all, he’d looked at my core and seen it for what it was.
sentences.chinese: 歸根究底，他曾見過我的內核，並且看見了它的本相。

sentences.english: Automatic lathes perform basically similar functions but apper in a varitety of forms.
sentences.chinese: 各種自動車牀作用基本相同，但形式不同。

sentences.english: The cost is similar to that of teak, but the maple is more durable and easier to keep clean.
sentences.chinese: 花費與柚木基本相同，但楓木更加耐用而且容易清潔。

sentences.english: Beholders use this ray in the same manner as the charm monster ray.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔使用此射線的方式與魅惑怪物射線基本相同。

sentences.english: Effect on other performance is the same for both plasticizers.
sentences.chinese: 兩種增塑劑對坯料其它性能的影響基本相同。

sentences.english: In comparison with cow thymosin, the main characteristic was the same.
sentences.chinese: 與小牛胸腺素比較，其主要特性基本相同。

sentences.english: However, the standard and procedure for the scholars were the same as those for the general people.
sentences.chinese: 但生員賑濟的標準與普通貧民基本相同。

sentences.english: Jesus invites us to come as we are.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌呼籲我們按本相去到祂跟前。

sentences.english: The contents of project funds application are basically the same as the feasibility study.
sentences.chinese: 資金申請報告的研究內容與可行性研究基本相同。

definition: courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor
I (first person pronoun used by royalty or nobility)
enlightened sage/brilliant master (flattering words applied to ruler)
the Dragon King of the Eastern Sea (mythology)
